H0.text: Consuming animals is how herbivores obtain most of their energy.

H1.text: Consuming plants is how herbivores obtain most of their energy.

H2.text: Producing sugar is the primary way herbivores obtain most of their energy.

H3.text: Absorbing sunlight is how herbivores obtain most of their energy.

A4.text: Herbivores form an important link in the food chain because they consume plants to digest the carbohydrates photosynthetically produced by a plant.
